articles.title: Manolo Marquez takes charge at FC Goa - Khel Now
articles.description: FC Goa appoint former Hyderabad FC talisman Manolo Marquez as their new head coach.
articles.content: FC Goa is delighted to confirm the appointment of Manolo Marquez as the Clubs new Head Coach. The Spaniard has put pen-to-paper on a multi-year contract that will see him take charge of the FC Goa Fi… [+3770 chars]

articles.title: IOA in race against time for holding elections to avoid international suspension of wrestling federation - The Indian Express
articles.description: The 45-day deadline to complete the election process ends on June 10, however the IOA is yet to formally kick-start the process
articles.content: Amidst protest by the countrys top wrestlers against the Wrestling Federation of India (WFI) president Brij Bhushan Sharan Singh, India is staring at international suspension. And the Indian Olympic … [+3544 chars]

articles.author: The Feed
articles.title: Gavaskar slams Hardik Pandya for disturbing Mohit Sharma's rhythm during last over of IPL 2023 - The Economic Times
articles.description: Sunil Gavaskar said Mohit Sharma was in good rhythm during the first 3-4 balls of the last over of IPL 2023 final. And when a bowler is in a such a good rhythm, he should not be disturbed much, the former India skipper said.
articles.content: After the end of the IPL final, many cricket experts, including former India skipper Sunil Gavaskar, questioned Gujarat Titan skipper Hardik Pandya's decision to have a chat with bowler Mohit Sharma … [+2132 chars]
